about_the_game:
Introducing the Murder Is Game Over Series Soundtrack, a compilation of spine-tingling melodies and haunting tunes from all three games in the series. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric soundscapes that set the tone for the thrilling adventures in each installment. From eerie whispers to heart-pounding beats, this soundtrack captures the essence of mystery and suspense that defines the Murder Is Game Over series.

And here's the best part: when you purchase the Murder Is Game Over bundle, you'll receive the complete soundtrack for free! Let the music guide you through the twists and turns of each investigation as you unravel the secrets from rural Vermont to what's hidden within the Italian Alps. Don't miss out on this exclusive offer to own the soundtrack to your detective journey. Get ready to immerse yourself in the chilling melodies of Murder Is Game Over!
